Author: SpaceWhale88
Text: Welcome to the club. We wear pink on Wednesdays.   But in all seriousness this is definitely bulimia.

Author: flamingtrashmonster
Text: Yes. That is bulimia. My friend used to purge by taking drugs that made her nauseous after binge eating, since she couldn’t get herself to puke on her own.  Bulimia isn’t so much to do with how you get yourself to purge, which in your case is self-induced vomiting. What matters is that the purging is intentional.
